Harry Reid confronted Joe Lieberman with some of the comments he'd made about obama during the presidential election. senator Joe Lieberman defended his comments and said he thought that he should be able to continue as chairman, the source says. no agreement was reached in the meeting, the source says, but Harry Reid apparently is looking at a coming caucus vote as a mechanism to resolve the standoff. the beijing games were old enough to compete, the international gymnastics federation( fig) said yesterday. but the federation wants more answers from two members of china's 2000 squad- Dong Fangxiao and Yang Yun - saying it does not consider the explanations and evidence provided to date in regards to these athletes as satisfactory. it also is moving forward with a licensing system that would serve as proof of age for a gymnast's entire career. in intense gunfights in the restive valley of swat where security forces are battling followers of radical cleric Maulana Fazlullah for over a year. clashes erupted when heavily-armed men targeted soldiers in kabal area, a stronghold of Maulana Fazlullah . retaliatory fire killed eight militants while one soldier was martyred, a security official said. the fighting also wounded some combatants, but their numbers were not available. swat used to be a tourist haven until last year when authorities moved thousands of troops in to the mountain district
